svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Measles vaccine coverage in 1990 vs Measles cases in 2015, 2015
Shown on the x-axis is the share of 1-year-olds who have been vaccinated against measles (MCV) in a given year.
Cases of measles per million population (WHO and UNPD 2017)
Source: Global Health Observatory Data Repository (2017), OWID Disease Burden Variables (using WHO and UNPD)
